long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Angelina Hart is reinventing what elegant, glamorous style looks like for the modern woman. She set out to create women's accessories that embody what she calls "The New Timeless", classic for the new century. Join Angelina on her journey to "bring the glamor back"!
